fields.name: bounty
fields.attribute: # [doc = " Bounty.owner == owner.key() は検証される"] # [account (mut , has_one = owner)]

fields.name: submission
fields.attribute: # [doc = " Submission.bounty_id == bounty.key() の検証がないため、"] # [doc = " 別のバウンティ用の Submission を渡しても通ってしまう"] # [account (mut)]

name: create_bounty
attributes: # [doc = " 新しいバウンティを作成"]
body: let b = & mut ctx . accounts . bounty ;
b . owner = ctx . accounts . owner . key () ;
b . reward = reward ;
b . submissions = 0 ;
msg ! ("Created bounty {} with reward {}" , b . key () , b . reward) ;

name: submit
body: let b = & mut ctx . accounts . bounty ;
let s = & mut ctx . accounts . submission ;
s . submitter = ctx . accounts . submitter . key () ;
s . bounty_id = b . key () ;
s . accepted = false ;
b . submissions = b . submissions . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("Submission {} recorded for bounty {} (total submissions: {})" , s . key () , b . key () , b . submissions) ;

name: accept
attributes: # [doc = " 提出を採用して報酬支払い"]
body: let b = & mut ctx . accounts . bounty ;
let s = & mut ctx . accounts . submission ;
s . accepted = true ;
* * b . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? -= b . reward ;
* * ctx . accounts . owner . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += b . reward ;
msg ! ("Submission {} accepted for bounty {}; {} paid {} lamports" , s . key () , b . key () , b . owner , b . reward) ;
